name: base-network-scanner
description: Scan devices on the network and add them to the device table
author: chibashr

after_scan.description: Called after a network scan is completed

before_scan.description: Called before a network scan starts

device_found.description: Called when a device is found during a scan

start_scan.description: Start a network scan with the given parameters
start_scan.returns: Scan ID that can be used to track the scan

get_scan_history.description: Get the history of previous scans
get_scan_history.returns: List of previous scans with results

get_scan_devices.description: Get devices discovered during a specific scan
get_scan_devices.returns: List of devices discovered during the scan
